content.rendered:
Supporting the Needs of Your Facility

Asset Management / Preservation 

Alticor Inc provides facility services to support the needs of our clients regardless of the size of the real estate portfolio. From sole proprietorships to large corporate campuses, the Alticor Inc team provides facility management and specialized construction to support the ongoing and ever-changing needs of our clients.

Alticor Inc Facility Management is comprised of two primary areas:

Integrated Facility Management (FM)

Alticor Inc’ Facility Management Solutions (FM) can bring significant benefits to client property assets. Whether managing a small facility or an extensive campus, Alticor Inc customizes a solution to meet each clients needs.

Alticor Inc provides proven solutions with decades of experience, and relationships with dozens of strategic partners, Alticor Inc can remove the burden of providing custodial, landscaping, pest control, and snow removal services from facility owners/managers. Utilizing Service Level Agreements (SLAs), Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and other metrics, Alticor Inc’ assure our clients’ needs are fulfilled to their complete satisfaction.

Mobile Maintenance Service

Alticor Inc’ Mobile Service Technicians provide 24x7x365, on-call services to address your facilities and occupants’ needs. Dispatched technicians perform thorough inspections, preventative maintenance, and repair of building systems in order to maximize operating efficiencies.
